summary: Obsessed with the idea of owning his first car so he can have sex in it, a young man takes any job he can find and ends up in an escalating series of crazy situations.
cast: Duncan|Akiji Kobayashi|Tetsuya Yûki|Yuuji Minakata|Ren Osugi|Susumu Terajima|Hideo Higashikokubaru|Masumi Okada|Taka Guadalcanal|Tokie Hidari|Takeshi Kitano|Yoneko Matsukane|Yôjin Hino|Hakuryû|Makoto Tsugawa|Sujitarô Tamabukuro|Moeko Ezawa|Baiken Jukkanji|Ryûshi Mizukami|Rô Naruse|Shintarô Takado|Kanji Tsuda|Yûrei Yanagi|Kazu Nagahama
title: Minnâ-yatteruka!
